meanings.definition: To express good wishes or congratulations.
meanings.sent1: She was felicitating her friend on the new job.
meanings.sent2: The mayor was felicitating the winners of the competition.
meanings.sent3: Felicitating the team for their hard work brought smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: Her warm felicitating words lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The crowd erupted in cheers as they felicitated the champion.

meanings.definition: To make someone happy or pleased.
meanings.sent1: The surprise gift felicitated her on her birthday.
meanings.sent2: The kind gesture truly felicitated him.
meanings.sent3: The delicious cake felicitated everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: His thoughtful words felicitated her heart.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset view felicitated their souls with joy.

meanings.definition: The act of congratulating or wishing someone well.
meanings.sent1: Her felicitating of the graduates was heartfelt.
meanings.sent2: The felicitating at the ceremony was filled with joy.
meanings.sent3: The felicitating speeches made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The felicitating from the audience was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The felicitating brought tears of happiness to their eyes.
